name: Petala Circa Rosas
description:
"They say a dream takes only a second or so, and yet in that second a man can live a lifetime." - Rod Serling, "The Twilight Zone"

 A war-weary bounty hunter, Jebb O’Shenny was a man whose time had run out. His eternal fate was a loop, living the same unending day repeatedly. Every day is the same...until now when he gets a letter slipped under the door.  Can he unlock the Secret of the Roses, to live again? Only time and you can say for sure. 

Keyboard controls for browser play: Arrow keys, Z, and X

FYI, this game was submitted for the Robot Party Game Jam if you want to read the lore and see the other amazing games that people made please so all of these entries are so talented. 

Thanks for viewing and if you so choose to play this game. I really do appreciate it if you play it. I never really thought I could make a game and here it is. This is my first game, so excuse the bugs (if any) or the simple appearance/look. Remember to stay happy, stay healthy, and always stay gold.
